column3: speakeasy kind of atmosphere. But the experience is first rate. Service during the pandemic was attentive while maintaining distance. Not the least bit overbearing or invasive. In a word it was perfect. Cocktails were spot on. Food? Oh yes
column4: the food. Wow. Everything I've ever ordered here has blown me away. Must be why I like it. So if you're looking for a first rate experience or trying to impress someone
column5: you might move Bavette's up to the top of your list. And if you're looking to impress me? Invite me along! I'm always ready.
